name: Hell Loop (HakunaSoft)
description:
You're trapped in a Hell Loop, and Satan's Minions are looking for you. Will you break the cycle, or be consumed by it?

Controls: 

WASD - Move

 Left Shift - Run

 Mouse - Move Camera

 LMB - Shoot

 MMB - Change Weapon

 R - Reload Weapon

 F - Return to Menu

 #horror #shooter #retro #survival #ldjam #ldjam47 #loop #ludumdare #indiedev #unity #madewithunity #gamedev
